definition: trusted/intimate/(of the emperor) to visit/variant of 幸[xing4]
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: He is too lazy to move but luckily he has strong toes.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然懒得不肯动，但是幸而有强壮的脚趾。

sentences.english: It is lucky that those who despise it in a cap revere it in a hat.
sentences.chinese: 幸而鄙视红帽子的人也还崇拜红法冠呢。

sentences.english: She was concerned but still blissfully ignorant of the potential ramifications.
sentences.chinese: 她开始担心了，但幸而不知道这些潜在后果。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the door of M. Madeleine's factory was like the face of a friend.
sentences.chinese: 幸而马德兰先生工厂的大门还象个朋友的面孔。

sentences.english: When qin day also, thanks to the end by shen Qiang pulled.
sentences.chinese: 这时秦天也末路了，幸而被沈蔷拉住了。

sentences.english: Dantès' first impulse was to escape, but fortunately he did not attempt it.
sentences.chinese: 唐太斯的第一个冲动就是想逃走，但幸而他克制住了。

sentences.english: Fortunately, God knows where to find the soul again.
sentences.chinese: 幸而上帝知道到什么地方去寻找她的灵魂。

sentences.english: She was somewhat reassured because no one in the Thenardier establishment drank much water.
sentences.chinese: 幸而德纳第家的人不大喝水，她的心又稍稍安稳了些。

sentences.english: How fortunatedly, I am just an ordinary person.
sentences.chinese: 幸而我只是一个平庸的人。

sentences.english: Also thanks to his relief, mei ling a life doesn't sound too bad.
sentences.chinese: 也幸而有他救济，美玲一家的生活还不至于太糟。

sentences.english: Fortunately there are several solutions to this focusing dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 幸而有一些解决对焦难题的方法。

definition: were it not for/if not for
not in such a way as to/not likely to
to such an extent as to/down to/up to
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
